derivation: from H6461 (פָּסַס); properly, the palm (of the hand) or sole (of the foot) (compare H6447 (פַּס)); by implication (plural)
outline:
1. flat (of the hand or foot), palm, sole
    1. of the tunic reaching to palms and soles (fig.)
strongs_def: a long and sleeved tunic (perhaps simply a wide one; from the original sense of the root, i.e. of many breadths)
